field.name: fNearDistance
field.desc: Under that distance to the player, the danger value will be the near value. After that, there is an interpolation to the far value

field.name: fNearValue
field.desc: Danger value added when the event is closer to the player than the near distance.

field.name: fFarDistance
field.desc: Maximum distance from the player for the vent to be consider. Under that, there is an interpolation to the near value

field.name: fFarValue
field.desc: Danger value added when the event is at the far limit.
